name: The Last Wizard Alive
description:
The Last Wizard Alive is a short tower defense game made for Ludum Dare 46 by me (kantal) and Mariusz Jarotek.

Game Rules

You're the last wizard on the battlefield. The goal of the game is to stay alive
as long as possible. Prevent diamonds from stealing. Score as much as you can. 
Each time you press space button when red heart is in the green container,
you will shoot once and healh will increase. 

Thanks for playing.  Review will be very helpful.

kantal and Mariusz
